roleset.name: occuring on both sides (of)
roleset.note: BILATERAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED (from bilateral.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: The supranuclear innervation is bilateral to the muscles of the forehead and eyes but only contralateral to the muscles of the lower part of the face.
example.arg: to the muscles of the forehead and eyes
